name: Dragon Eggs
description:
Welcome to Dragon Eggs!

RULES & OBJECTIVES

The objective is to collect all 7 Dragon Eggs from the extended game environment before you run out of time.

Any contact with the Dragon Guards will result in elimination.

Score is based on the time taken to complete the game.

Eggs are distributed randomly and more than one egg could be found in one location.

There is no limit to the number of eggs that can be carried by the dragon.

Use arrow keys for control.

Enjoy gaming!

CREDITS

Developed by Aditya S Nath

Graphics: Rozanne Jojo

Concept: Ritika Sharma

Background Track: Chinese Dragon by Derek Fiechter & Brandon Fiechter (recommended by Sandeep Raju)
